definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.english: After he pulled the trigger, the rifle kicked back and the hunter lost his balance.
sentences.chinese: 猎人扣动板机，猎枪的反冲力使他的身体失去了平衡。

sentences.english: The rifle recoils when it is fired.
sentences.chinese: 步枪射出子弹后要反冲一下。

sentences.english: The backwashing frequency of bio-ceramic filter is one time per week.
sentences.chinese: 生物陶粒柱的反冲频率为每周一次。

sentences.english: Some of the energy intended for the photon is drained off by the recoiling atom.
sentences.chinese: 原来给予光子的能量有一部分为反冲原子所消耗。

sentences.english: When an atom shoots out a photon of light, it recoils like a gun.
sentences.chinese: 原子发出光子时，会象枪一样地反冲。

sentences.english: Some of the dim branches exhibit bright recoil leaders.
sentences.chinese: 一部分暗淡的分叉显示出闪亮的反冲先导。

sentences.english: Stainless steel has a greater elastic springback than mild steel.
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢的弹性反冲比低碳钢要强。

sentences.english: Now, there has been a backlash against the backlash.
sentences.chinese: 现在，曾经有一个反冲的反弹。

sentences.english: Luckily it missed me, but there must have been some kind of Backlash.
sentences.chinese: 还好雪崩没有砸到我可是它一定产生了某种反冲。
枪朝他的肩部反冲过去。

sentences.english: Be careful when you start the motor, it sometimes kicks back.
sentences.chinese: 发动摩托车时要注意，有时会出现反冲现象。

sentences.english: Having backlash and backdraft play nice together is harder.
sentences.chinese: 要让反冲和反噬效果同时表现良好更有难度。

sentences.english: The present invention provides an anti-kickback device suitable for use on circular saws.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供一种适用于在圆锯上的防反冲装置。

definition: to make an about-turn/to reverse one's direction, policy, sequence etc/to turn things on their head
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
